Headline: Lionel Messi: Chinese officials call off Argentina games amid anger over star not playing - BBC Sport
Content: Chinese officials call off two Argentina friendlies after Lionel Messi failed to turn out for Inter Miami in an exhibition match in Hong Kong.

Headline: Lionel Messi: Chinese fury as superstar plays in Japan after missing Hong Kong match - BBC News
Content: The superstar sat out a Hong Kong match just days before, sparking anger and conspiracy theories.

Headline: Lionel Messi: Inter Miami star defends Hong Kong friendly absence - BBC Sport
Content: Argentina star Lionel Messi says it was a shame he could not play in Inter Miamiâ€™s friendly against a League XI in Hong Kong.

Headline: Lionel Messi defends injury absence in Hong Kong friendly after fans boo - BBC Sport
Content: Forward Lionel Messi says "I always want to play" after fans booed Inter Miami because he missed a pre-season friendly in Hong Kong.

Headline: Lionel Messi: Fans angered as World Cup winner fails to play in Hong Kong - BBC Sport
Content: Angry fans in Hong Kong boo Inter Miami during a pre-season friendly game as World Cup winner Lionel Messi is left on the bench.
